      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(BufferedImage image,
                             String path)
                      throws IOException
        Save an image with the given file name. The method tries to save the image using the file extension. If the file name is not supported or if there is none, the image is saved as PNG.
        Parameters:
        image - image to save
        path - file name
        Throws:
        IOException

      • saveImage

        public static void saveImage(IGeometry[] geoms,
                             String path,
                             Color[] foregrounds,
                             Color background,
                             int width,
                             int height)
                      throws Exception
        Save a collection of geometries in the given image file.
        Parameters:
        geoms - geometries
        path - image file
        foregrounds - colors associated with each geometry
        background - background color
        width - width of the image
        height - height of the image
        Throws:
        Exception

      • collectionsToImage

        public static <Feature extends IFeature> void collectionsToImage(List<? extends IFeatureCollection<Feature>> collections,
                                                                 List<Color> colors,
                                                                 Color background,
                                                                 String path,
                                                                 double scale)
                                                          throws Exception
        Save collections of features in an image file.
        Type Parameters:
        Feature - Type of the features to save
        Parameters:
        collections - collections of features
        colors - colors associated with each collection
        background - background color
        path - file name
        scale - scale used for the rendering
        Throws:
        Exception
